title: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer
content:
Blend is a diverse team of problem solvers who believe that the world’s financial resources should be more accessible. Our cloud banking platform is used by Wells Fargo, U.S. Bank, and over 330 other financial services firms to acquire more customers, increase productivity, and deliver end-to-end digital experiences. Our software enables our customers to process an average of more than $5 billion in loans per day, making it possible for consumers to reach their financial goals faster and lead better lives. Come do work that matters.
 Blend’s IT team needs an Infrastructure Engineer to plan, build, and maintain our growing cloud infrastructure footprint and lend scripting expertise to other subject matter experts on the team to help with our adoption of DevOps principles. The Infrastructure Engineer will be the subject matter expert on the team for deploying and configuring services using Terraform and Ansible and will manage our AWS services for the team.  This position will work closely with our Information Security team to ensure proper hardening across all layers of infrastructure, as well as with individual stakeholders on the IT Operations team that need servers deployed for their projects.
How you'll contribute: 

Design, plan, deploy, and maintain cloud infrastructure
Help develop our IaC deployment workflows using Terraform Enterprise and Github
Assist our sys admins with various projects that require scripting
Document setups, processes, and configurations as necessary
Assist team members with various admin tasks across all services we manage

Who you are: 

You are a strong verbal and written communicator in English
You have strong understanding of AWS: 

You know VPCs, subnetting, and supernetting
You know the right AMI id for any use case--or at least where to look

Strong understanding of Linux and Windows server administration and configuration
Familiar and comfortable with a scripting language like Bash or Python
You have Active Directory architecture and administration experience

Nice to Have: 

Experience working in a heavily regulated industry
Experience with JAMF, Okta, Zoom, G Suite, Meraki, Atlassian, and Zendesk
Experience with, or knowledge of, DevOps principles and automation
